title: Notifications of {{recipient}}
subtitle: Read notifications of {{recipient}}. You can filter them by IUN Code and send date.
subtitle-delegated-notifications: Read the notifications delegated to {{recipient}}. You can filter them by IUN Code and send date.

errors.iun: Please enter a valid IUN code

empty-state.filtered: We couldn't find any results: try different filters. <0>Remove filters</0>
empty-state.delegate: There are no notifications delegated to {{name}} to read.

detail.document-not-available: The document will be available for download in a few minutes. You can try again by reloading the page or clicking on the link of the requested document
detail.cancelled-alert-text: This notification has been cancelled by the sending organisation. You can ignore the content.

payment.title: Payment
payment.subtitle: In this notification, there are multiple payment notices: select the one you want to pay. Some notices include notification fees.
payment.subtitle-f24: You can pay for this notification via F24. To see the details, open the forms.
payment.subtitle-mixed: In this notification, there are more payment options: select or download the one you want to pay. Some amounts include the notification fees.
payment.cancelled-alert-text-payment: For any reimbursement of payments related to this notification, please contact the sender. If you made a payment after the notification was cancelled, the list may not be updated.
payment.pay-with-f24: If you prefer, you can pay via F24.
payment.message-error-fetch-payment: We were unable to retrieve payment details for this notification.
payment.cancelled-message: For any reimbursement of payments related to this notification, please contact the sender. If you made a payment after the notification was cancelled, the information below may not be updated.

status.succeded-tooltip: Your payment has been sent successfully.
status.failed-tooltip: The notice has expired and can no longer be paid. For more information, please contact the sender.
status.inprogress-tooltip: The payment is in progress. Please reload the page in a few hours to verify. If this is still in progress, please contact support.
status.canceled-tooltip: The notice has been revoked. For more information, please contact the sender.

error.notice-error: There's a problem with this notice.
error.assistence: Reload it or contact support with the error code
error.duplicated: This notice has already been paid for. The status will be updated shortly.

acts_files.downloadable_acts: Documents are available online for 120 days from the completion of the notification.
acts_files.not_downloadable_acts: 120 days have passed since the completion date. If you want to obtain the documents, please contact the sender.
acts_files.downloadable_aar: The acknowledgement of receipt is available online for 10 years from completion of the notification.
acts_files.not_downloadable_aar: As 10 years have passed since the completion date, the acknowledgement of receipt is no longer available.
acts_files.notification_cancelled_aar: As this notification has been cancelled, the download of the Acknowledgement of Receipt has been disabled.
acts_files.notification_cancelled_acts: Since this notification has been cancelled, the document download has been disabled.
acts_files.effected_faq: When do I complete a notification?
